arts.ttl: Ralph Hasenhüttl: “We don’t reward ourselves for the effort"
arts.sum: Bochum picks an invaluable point away at Wolfsburg in Dieter Hecking’s return to Volksparkstadion. Both coaches were satisfied with different phases of the game.

arts.ttl: Mattias Svanberg salvages point for Wolfsburg in draw Bochum
arts.sum: Wolfsburg and Bochum held each other to a 1-1 draw as Erhan Mašović and Mattias Svanberg both scored from corners in a game with multiple chances for both sides. Wolfsburg's Mohamed Amoura came close early on, forcing a save from Bochum's goalkeeper Timo Horn after intercepting a pass from the back.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Alonso writes history, wins for Mainz and Augsburg, Hecking draw in Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen are back to winning ways after two goalless draws. Meanwhile, Mainz secure back-to-back wins. Wolfsburg avoid defeat with a late goal against Bochum.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs. Bochum preview: Can the visitors end their long wait for an away win?
arts.sum: Bochum will attempt to claim the long wait for their first away league win of the season when they travel to the Volkswagen Arena for Saturday’s clash with Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: Brentford loanee Mads Roerslev in contention for first Bundesliga start
arts.sum: Brentford loanee Mads Roerslev might be in line for his Bundesliga starting XI debut this coming Saturday. The Dane’s current German outfit, Wolfsburg, are without Kilian Fischer, who is suspended.…

arts.ttl: Bochum appoint Timo Horn as club’s No. 1 goalkeeper
arts.sum: VfL Bochum trainer Dieter Hecking has confirmed that Timo Horn will now serve as his starting goalkeeper.
